comment.text: Plays an important role in the activity of long-term repopulating hematopoietic stem cells (LT-HSCs).
Interacts with BMI1 (PubMed:25185265). Part of a complex consisting of UBAP2L, BMI1 and RNF2(PubMed:25185265).

property.value: Expressed in left lobe of thyroid gland and 231 other tissues
P:binding of sperm to zona pellucida
